channel.title: timescaledb on Dwarves Foundation
channel.description: Recent content in timescaledb on Dwarves Foundation

item.title: Migrate regular tables into TimescaleDB hypertables to improve query performance
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Due to increasing trading volume, the user_trades and incomes tables have grown significantly, causing slower performance in our reporting queries. To address this, we propose migrating these tables to TimescaleDB, which will allow us to partition the data into time-based chunks.
